dct_description_sm: At page top, above map: Mexica oder Neu Spannien. Fig: 23 (map top right). California labeled Californie I. With French title inside border and German title outside border. Spelling in title changed to Mexique and Nouvelle.
BN Manesson-Mallet I A(640) & I B; Faupel's Americana 91/434.

Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des ganzen Welt-Kreisses ..., V, Franckfurt, 1684. Issued in his German edition: Beschreibung des gantzen weltkreises ..., J.A. Jung ... Frankfurt am Mayn 1719.
